description: Barbara Gordon is back as Batgirl – and she's going to have to face the city's most horrifying new villains as well as the dark secrets from her past. You won't want to miss this
name: Vol. 1

description: The Five Horsemen of the Apocolypse sit and wait for Judgment Day. Until then, what do they do? Some are kept busier than others, but what if one of them falls in love? This is what happens to Death as he falls for a beautiful girl and must come to terms with her morality and his destiny.

Attention all members of the Federation! The Starship Constellation II is ready to leave dry dock for space. Commander Aya Nakajima and her crew of misfits have endless parties, go back in time to eat whale, fight Klingons for fun, face off with the famous crew of the Enterprise, and much more! Learn why the U.S.S. Enterprise is the only focus of the Star Trek series.

Legendary writer Tom DeFalco (AMAZING SPIDER-MAN) and acclaimed artist Horacio Domingues (FANTASTIC FOUR: TRUE STORY) bring you the origins of the original Avenger, Ant-Man! Hank Pym has had a life full of adventure and success, failure and humiliation. Known by a variety of names — including Ant-Man, Giant-Man, Goliath and Yellowjacket — he’s been an innovative scientist, a famed super hero, an abusive spouse and more. What demons drive a man like Hank Pym? How did he begin his heroic career? ANT-MAN: SEASON ONE tells the story of the man behind the myth, and reveals the fears and paranoia that propelled him to greatest heights and the darkest depths! Also includes AVENGERS ACADEMY #1.
name: HC

description: An all-new, expanded anthology series from the creator of Luftwaffe/WWII/Kamikaze:1946 series! The term "Tigers" was used by the Luftwaffe of World War II to address their most aggressive pilots. This first issue introduces the most famous and aggressive true top ace of all, Erich Hartmann, who shot down 352 enemy planes (confirmed), and was called the "Black Devil" by the Soviets for his black-nosed Messerschmitt Bf-109. To be told in six parts, the true survivor story of the "Black Devil" will explain why the Soviets put a price on his head and illegally kept him a prisoner 10 years after the war! Also included will be the return of the popular Luftwaffe:1946 series and the new Tigers of Terra series, Luftwaffe: 2040! Also, fan art, and a regular short- story series by Belgian talent, Marcel Magnette. Plus, technical and historical profiles, including new "Reichdreams" files from the famous Miranda/Mercado team!

This month's anthology series celebrates Tigers of Terra's 15th anniversary! It starts with Tiger of Terra's "Luftwafte: 2040" episode, which focuses on the new Luftwafte in the year 2040 created by the Amazon-like Viragonian Empire in order to terrorize the Earth forces. Next, Dora in the "Luftwafte: 1946" episode faces the same firebombing campaign that she witnessed in Germany and is determined to testfly the interecepter before it is fully ready. In the "Black Devil" episode, Erich Hartman enters his first combat sortie that would eventually lead him to the future as the greatest ace in history. Plus, a special feature of Nazi space programs that could've made Wehrner von Braun the first man in space! Also, an extra feature on secret Soviet manned flight that was made before the official successful flight on April 1961! And, more "Reichdream" features and Luftwafte shorts by Marcel Magnett!

This third issue covers the continuing saga of the true story of world's greatest elite ace, Erich Hartmann. It is now 1942, with war raging over Europe, and a young Erich finally gets a chance for a solo flight with his Stuka when he accidentally shoots at his commander's plane! Also: Luftwaffe: 1946, Tigers of Terra/Luftwaffe: 2040, and a technical special covering German carriers of World War II, both real and imagined. All this, plus another master story by Belgian talent Marcel Magnette and a tech section by Spain's Miranda/Mercado team.

This fourth issue covers the introduction of Luftwaffe:1946 story "Wild Angels." This feature will include the experiences of the "Angels in the Sky," women who fought in World War II, from the female ferry pilots of Germany, the United States and the British Empire to the Soviet female combat pilots. The main focus will be Hanna Reitsch, the most famous aviatrix of all. In "Black Devil," German ace Erich Hartmann must survive his 300th combat victory so he can finally marry the woman he loves. In "Tigers of Terra/Luftwaffe: 2040," Reina Sabre finds out that her friend Rex Ritter is preserving Jill Sabre's body so he can attempt to clone her. This disturbing thought plagues Reina while she fights desperately against the Viragonian Luftwaffe fighters. All this plus a special section covering the Luftsturm, the SS branch of the Hitler's Air Guard units. And if that weren't enough, we've another master story by Belgian talent Marcel Magnette and a tech section by Spain's Miranda/Mercado team!

This sixth issue continues the story of Hanna Reitsch, the premier Nazi aviatrix who considered creating an all- female suicide air unit to defend her home! In the last episode of "Black Devil," German ace Erich Hartmann finally surrenders to the Americans, only to be handed over to the Soviets! In Tigers of Terra/Luftwaffe: 2040, Reina Saber tracks down the Viragonians' best enemy ace, only to discover that she is fighting against clones of herself and her teammates! Bonuses this issue include a short introduction of Retroman, a former WWII Japanese Army motorcyclist, and a special section entitled "Raumkrieg," covering the Nazi plans for the conquest of space! And, another master story by Belgian talent, Marcel Magnette, and a text section by Spain's Miranda/Mercado team!

This ninth issue covers the concluding story of Adolf Galland, the Fighter General, who will fly his beloved Me-262 jet fighter to the end, only to destroy his squadron when he finds out that the Americans have no plans to fight against the Soviets. Plus: Luftwaffe:1946, Tigers of Terra/Luftwaffe:2040, Panzerducks, another master story by Belgian talent Marcel Magnette, and a tech section by Spain's Miranda/Mercado team!

Fred Perry's adventure for the ages is now collected in one tome that's truly timeless! What happens when the Great Emancipator is suddenly freed from the bonds of time to right wrongs throughout history? Taken out of time on the night of his assassination, Abraham Lincoln learns all of history is threatened by the Tyrant of Time, Void Stalin - and that he is (or will be) Stalin's arch enemy! Faced with fiends like Mephitler and Apocalypse Mao, Lincoln joins with such historic heroes as Isaac Newton, Albert Einstein, Ben Franklin and George Washington Carver to thwart the forces of evil in the past, present and future. In his last hour, he lived a lifetime!
name: Fate of the Union

description:
A member of the INTERCEPTOR crew is injured! Can AYA heal the damage?

What is the shocking secret of the TATTOOED MAN?
name: Tattoo You

description: At last, in his own series, the man with vision so good, he can see into tomorrow! Thrill to the adventures of Tomorrow Man as he enters the "toughest contest in the world" to determine the fate of history. Witness the revelation of his origin! All this plus all new story and art!

Don't let summer reruns, vacation reading and sunbathing naps rot your brain-or the zombies will complain about the food! See how the undead survive the summer heat in a collection of pin-ups and short stories from your favorite A.P. artists, including a "Littlest Zombie" vignette from Fred Perry!

The Novahawk Squadron takes an unrelenting pounding as bogies skewer the skies of Brimstone and threaten a populated area. A few Novahawks who are making their way through inhospitable terrain might have a shot at saving the colonists -- if they can get past the soldiers who block them. When a fire breaks out, hopes of arriving in time become the next casualities. They aren't the last.

Caught in the final battle of WWIII between Old America, the fascists, and the incredible power of the mysterious Elysium, Jed Saxon faces not just his own destruction but the loss of his only friends. Now, Earth itself has released its fury in the form of a massive hurricane, capable of sweeping everyone and everything into oblivion!

The Storm has broken, and the War to decide the fate of Humanity begins! A mighty clash of armies sets off the latest mini-series from veteran comic creator Joe Wight, launching the final showdown between Old America and the tyrannical Neo- Fascists controlling Central and South America. The mysterious "Elysium" also plays its trump card in the form of a deadly nuclear space platform to stop the Americans in their tracks.

The secret society Elysium has revealed itself to Old America, and the two forces clash in the darkness of space between Earth and the Moon. Meanwhile, in the Caribbean, Jed and Nigel try to escape through the rain-choked jungles of a Neo-Nazi island, pursued by a dark army bent on capturing or killing them outright

Old America must invade the Neo-Nazi islands of the Caribbean, in the face of a killer storm. Any delay will bring nearly half a million fresh troops to the battlefield against them. The submarine Neptune, along with its reluctant passengers Richard and Melissa, flees from a massive sub-hunting Neo-Nazi fleet and must use its superior technology against overwhelming strength! Now in full-color!

War has broken across the Neo-Nazi controlled islands of the Caribbean, and nothing will stop the clash of Old America and the powerful fascist warlords. Jed, Nigel, and Toots are caught on a Neo-Nazi island and hunted down as these mighty armies begin the last bloody battle of World War Three. There is no escape, there is no surrender, there is only war.

The storm has broken, but the fires of war are out of control. The First World has returned to reclaim what's left of humanity, and a tiny island in the Caribbean becomes the flashpoint for the last battle of World War 3. Old America begins the final assault on the Neo-Nazi controlled region, and Richard and Melissa are caught in the center of the battle and separated by a titanic clash of armies.

A price must be paid, and luck can hold only so long. Toots realizes what Jed and Nigel have known for a long time: No one is bulletproof. A swarm of Neo-Nazis close in on Jed and Nigel as they try to escape to the Sappho 3. They fight the fascists to the last round, but in the end, Toots must escape the Neo-Nazi island on her own and find her destiny. Alone.

U.S. Marines assault the Nationalist-occupied island of Nevis, striking flames to the last battle of World War Three. It is a battle that will decide the fate of Earth ? freedom or utter slavery. Richard and Melissa are caught between the hammer and the anvil, and the mysterious organization known as Elysium plays the ultimate wild card to crush Old America before they themselves are hunted down.

The Neo-Nazi forces and the last remnants of Old America's military clash over a small island in the Caribbean, all under the impact of Nature's fury in the form of a tremendous hurricane. Ex-Special Forces soldier Jed Saxon and his small band of allies struggle to get out alive while helping to scout and sabotage the Neo-Nazis' operation. Mean, they're threatened by the powerful technology of the mysterious group known as Elysium. Even the powerful bonds of friendship and love among them may not be enough to survive the last battle of World War Three.

The untold tales of Atomic Robo are un-untold at last! Thrills, spills, chills, and no dill (pickles), this series has it all. Except pickles. The Sparrow thwarts Nazis; Bruce Lee gets philosophical; Robo goes for a swim; and more!
name: To Kill A Sparrow, Part 4

volume.name: Atomic Robo Presents Real Science Adventures

description:
The hunt for Peter Stanchek intensifies after an epic battle with Pittsburgh S.W.A.T forces him to use his powers out in the open. Now he faces the most difficult decision of his life. Continue to put his friends in harm's way…or abandon them for the safety of Toyo Harada's Harbinger Foundation?

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
RegRegular CoverArturo Lozzi1
VarVariant CoverDoug Braithwaite2
2ndSecond Printing Black-and-White Variant CoverArturo Lozzi3

Issue Recap

Harbinger #2 opens up 10 years ago in Mumbai, India with Toyo Harada and introduces the third self-activated psiot as a baby, Darpan. His power is that he can conjure up your darkest memories and make you relive them fuller than they were in reality. When he attempts to use his power on Harada uncontrolled, Harada is able to fight through and overcome his power and see how wonderful he really is.

Back in present-day, soldiers of Project Rising Spirit are closing in on Peter Stanchek, Joseph Irons, and Kris Hathaway. PRS tries to dampen Peters powers by strobing the area with phase electromagnetic pulses. This has little effect on Peter, but when the soldiers grab Kris, he just loses it and knocks everybody out. The soldiers open fire on Peter, but it does no good because he can redirect the bullets. Through violence and maybe fear, Peter violently attacks the soldiers. Peter is shown to be extremely powerful when he locates Mr. Tull and through telekinesis pulls the van he's in to his location with no struggle. Instead of killing him, he mind-wipes Mr. Tull all the way back to infancy.

After the fight, Peter is unable to turn off his powers without the help of Harada, currently projecting himself as a dog. Harada then pulls Peter into his mind telepathically to help him get control. It's here that Harada explains who Mr. Tull is and who he works for. Harada is the only other person that Peter has met with psionic abilities at this point and he is extremely powerful. So, when Harada offers to take him in and train him, he accepts.

Harada sends in his recruitment team made up of Rachel Hopson and Edward Sedgewick to pick up Peter, Joe, and Kris to escape the scene. Before Harada leaves, he mind wipes all the witnesses. Shortly after the van drives off, it stops and Peter has to separate from Joe and Kris to leave and begin his training. This includes releasing Kris from the mind control that Peter has on her. After doing so, she freaks out and violently wants to hurt Peter for what he has done. After the intense night, Joe, in disbelief that Peter is really leaving him, tells Peter that he is the most terrifying person he has ever known. Peter then drives off to join the Harbinger foundation.
name: Omega Rising: Part 2

description: A mysterious corporation known as Zenith Corp., run by Ivan Seethe, has suddenly emerged in various cities all over the world. Little is known about Seethe or his corporation except for his unethical, underhanded business practices. He is also a relic connoisseur and takes great pride hin his vast collection. Now he has set his eyes on possessing the Three Books of Peril, which are believed to possess extraordinary powers. Little does Warrior Nun Areala know that one of the books is locked securely within the Church's vault, and that Seethe will stop at NOTHING to obtain it and use it towards his ULTIMATE goal! Join Areala and the rest of the characters of the Warrior Nun universe in an epic 4-part battle to possess the Three Books of Peril. Who will be the one to claim the greatest power the Earth has ever known?
name: Books of Peril, Part One: The Book of Ki'Ari

description: Having unsuccessfully prevented Seethe and his relic hunters from stealing the Book of Ki'Ari from within the Church's vault, Warrior Nun Areala and the rest of the members of the Church must now devise a way of keeping him from retrieving the Book of Sharate from the cursed Egyptian pyramid of Zatanitu. Once inside the cursed pyramid, Areala and Seethe's relic hunters must defend against various deadly traps and undead Egyptian warriors. If they survive that, they must do battle with the guardian of the Book of Sharate himself. Find out what twists and turns await Areala as she ventures into the depths of the ensorcelled tomb to retrieve the second Book of Peril.
name: Books of Peril, Part Two: The Book of Sharate

description: The epic struggle for the Books of Peril continues as Warrior Nun Areala teams up with the Magic Priests in an underwater battle to prevent Seethe's relic hunters from recovering the Book of Xitan from Xitan's sacred crypt, located in the depths of the South Atlantic Ocean. On top of each other's interference, both teams must face the giant ancient guardian there to thwart their attempts. If Seethe should obtain the Book of Xitan and combine it with the other two Books of Peril already in his possession, it would spell certain doom for Areala and the rest of humankind. Pray that she succeeds!

Even with two Books of Peril in Ivan Seethe's possession, his plans to possess the world's most omnipotent power cannot commence without the third and final component, which is now in Warrior Nun Areala's hands. With this in mind, Seethe uses his special "bargaining chip" to lure Areala and the Magic Priests to a secret volcanic island in the Pacific Ocean, where they must surrender the third book or suffer the dire consequences. Little do they know that the island is the sacred ground from which the three Books of Peril must be chanted in order to unleash their power! Either option Areala chooses is bound to cost her dearly. Don't dare miss the suspense as Areala makes the most important decision of her life, and witness the conclusion to the climactic struggle for the Books of Peril and the fate of the world!

After briefly absorbing the spirits of the three Books of Peril, Seethe is left with the ability to see visions of ancient relics that will aid him in furthering his ultimate enigmatic goal. Seethe's latest vision is of the Scepter of the Crescent Moon, a relic that has the ability to resurrect an ancient evil militia. Meanwhile, back at the Church, Areala is unexpectedly visited by an unwelcome guest from her past, someone who will suspiciously warn her of Seethe's plans of imminent doom. Follow Areala on her latest epic adventure as she teams up with an unlikely foe in order to stop a greater evil from being unleashed!

As a fierce struggle between two foes comes to an end, demon princess Lilith finally manages to convince Areala that Seethe not only continues to live, but is a conduit to a greater evil that admittedly threatens Lilith's reign over the demonic underworld as well as all precious life on Earth. Their only hope to save what they both hold dear is for the two of them to infiltrate Seethe's sacred lair and prevent him from using the Scepter of the Crescent Moon to awaken an ancient militia that he seeks to utilize in order to further even greater evil deeds.

After having secretly infiltrated Ivan Seethe's hidden lair, Areala and demon princess Lilith have unexpectedly been taken prisoner and invited by Seethe to witness firsthand the true power of the Scepter of the Crescent Moon as well as the genesis of his new militia. Meanwhile, back at St. Illumine Church, Father Gomez uses the Church's super computer Gabriel to dig deeper into Seethe's past and discovers shocking revelations regarding Seethe and his enigmatic agenda. Find out what happens when Heaven and Hell unite to prevent chaos from invading their worlds in this third and final chapter of "Scepter of the Crescent Moon"!

While carrying deep grief in her heart and holding herself responsible for her young friend Jason's death, Areala now contemplates her future involving the Church and her position as a Warrior Nun. But as Areala walks through the streets of New York to clear her head of grief and indecision, she gets a brief glimpse of something or someone in the crowded streets that will help make up her mind for her.

A mysterious fog of disbelief clouds Areala's eyes when she sees amongst a crowd a boy who bears an uncanny likeness to her dead friend Jason. Yet even though the boy appears to be Jason in visage, his cold soulless eyes say otherwise. The boy runs away when Areala calls out to him, and now she must follow the boy down a path that will lead her through the alleyways of New York and end in the shocking truth about what really happened to Jason.

As Areala's emotional and perilous hunt for what appears to be her dead friend Jason comes to an end, she discovers that the chase has lead her to a world of deceit and treachery, all in the guise of her new nemesis, Ivan Seethe. Having finally come face to face with the young boy, she finds that things don't appear as they seem and that he is one part of another of Seethe's new devious machinations. But in order to get to Seethe and prevent him from carrying out his latest scheme, Areala must face off against an old friend and save him from falling forever into Seethe's clutches.

Andrew Fellows is a struggling accountant with two kids that are starting to resent him, a marriage that's slowly drifting into the 'loveless' category and an ex-girlfriend who's increasingly on his mind. It's a recipe for a fairly standard suburban drama... except for one thing. Andrew Fellows is married to Jennifer Blood. This will not end well.
name: Try Not To Think About It, Andrew Fellows

description:
Guns. Acid. Cameras. School. The themes behind the controversial Hellblazer: 'Shoot' by WARREN ELLIS and PHIL JIMENEZ merge with the attitude of the GRANT MORRISON and PHILIP BOND masterpiece of teenage revolt, Kill Your Boyfriend, delivering a story of magic, passion and disinformation. WILD CHILDREN: A different type of education.

A group of students takes over a high school with guns and something hidden under a blanket. A police task force arrives, ready to shoot. The group broadcasts the lecture they give the hostages live on the web. Pretty fast it becomes obvious that nothing is as it seems.

Areala has lately adopted a strangely over-aggressive nature that is interfering with her duties as Warrior Nun. Tensions begin to rise within St. Illumine Church as a friendly training exercise between Areala and Magic Priest Father Stone ends in a fierce battle. Puzzled by Areala's series of belligerent outbursts, the church decides to suspend her duties as Warrior Nun pending an investigation into her actions. Meanwhile, Ivan Seethe, aware of these recent events, sees an opportune moment to breach the Church's weakened defenses and create chaos throughout it!

Chaos begins to culminate as a rampaging Areala is hunted through the halls of the St. Illumine Church, after being charged for the attacks on several Magic Priests. Through extensive investigation, the church's supercomputer Gabriel has concluded that Ariel has been infected with a techno-virus by agents of Ivan Seethe. Once introduced into the body, the virus slowly takes over the victim's central nervous system, transforming them it into a living, breathing machine controlled by Seethe himself! Now precious moments begin to waste away as Father Gomez and the Magic Priests hunt down Areala in a desperate attempt to save her from a virus that could ultimately strip her of her humanity!

The hunt for Areala continues as Father Crowe and the remaining Magic Priests close in on her, even as she continues to cause mass destruction throughout St. Illumine's church due to the side effects of Seethe's techno virus. At the same time, Father Gomez desperately seeks the aid of the church's supercomputer, Gabriel, to find a cure for the virus that has all but consumed the rest of Areala's humanity. Unfortunately, the cure he finds might heal Areala, but could cause the demise of a brave Magic Priest willing to forsake his life to save hers.

The legend of a great evil in Black Crest Falls in Eastern Europe grows as a cursed plague turns several people in surrounding towns into mindless creatures. One of the last survivors, a young princess, must seek Areala's aid to investigate the looming plague that has decimated her people.

As Areala and Princess Ki'Ree venture deeper into the forests of Black Crest Falls, they discover an ancient dwelling that holds clues to the plague's origin. There they must fend off creatures turned by the looming plague and resist becoming the plague's next victims.

Magic gangs fight for control against government forces seriously out of their depth. Even with Piper, Phoebe, and Paige on the case, there is little they can do without their own magic. Overwhelmed and outnumbered, the side of good must hang all their hope on the single most powerful witch in the world.
name: Prue Ya Gonna Call?

description: While carrying deep grief in her heart and holding herself responsible for her young friend Jason's death, Areala now contemplates her future involving the Church and her position as a Warrior Nun. But as Areala walks through the streets of New York to clear her head of grief and indecision, she gets a brief glimpse of something or someone in the crowded streets that will help make up her mind for her.

While carrying deep grief in her heart and holding herself responsible for her young friend Jason's death, Areala now contemplates her future involving the Church and her position as a Warrior Nun. But as Areala walks through the streets of New York to clear her head of grief and indecision, she gets a brief glimpse of something or someone in the crowded streets that will help make up her mind for her.

What men must know, a boy must learn.

This fantastic tale introduces the world of the LOOKOUTS. Follow these young adventurers as they learn to master the perilous and enchanted Eyrewood forest, where wonder and danger exist in equal measure.
name: Riddle, Part 1; Magus Arbor

description:
Classic Judge Dredd reprints from the pages of weekly British anthology comic 2000AD.

Cover: Rich Larson and Sam De La Rosa (Judge Dredd)

  • The Booby Prize (2000AD Sci-Fi Special 1984) (John Wagner and Alan Grant - Cliff Robinson)
  • The Horsemen of the Apocalpyse (2000AD Sci-Fi Special 1987) (John Wagner and Alan Grant - Mike Collins and Mark Farmer)
  • Alien Seeds (prog 148) (John Wagner - Ron Smith)

Tharg's Future Shocks

  • Video (prog 478) (John Smith - Geoff Senior)
name: Judge Dredd 22

description: Your prayers have been answered! Warrior Nun will grace shelves again with an all-new adventure! Experience a brand-new, re-envisioned Warrior Nun! A violent explosion rocks the halls of the Vatican, revealing an alarming plot to attain several ancient, holy relics by a secret society known as The Advent. Charged with the investigation is Sister Isabel, a high-ranking agent of the Order of Crosius, an elite, clandestine group of warriors. The action kicks off as Isabel, with the aid of a sworn enemy, races across the globe to battle the deadly competition and exact savage vengeance.

Classic Judge Dredd reprints from the pages of weekly British anthology comic 2000AD.

Cover: Jackson Guice (Judge Dredd)

  • The Man Who Knew Too Much (progs 438-439) (John Wagner and Alan Grant - Carlos Ezquerra)
  • The Magnificent Obsession (progs 440-441) (John Wagner and Alan Grant - Cam Kennedy)
  • Walter's Secret Job (prog 33) (John Wagner - Ian Gibson)
name: Judge Dredd 24

description: In a world much like ours, the demonic forces of Hell are all too real. Thankfully, the Catholic Church has risen to meet the threat with two elite, specially trained forces: Magic Priests and Warrior Nuns. Once per generation, the Valkyrie-turned-angel Areala embodies herself in a worthy sister of the Warrior Nun order. This time, a promising young nun named Shannon Masters has been chosen as her newest incarnation. But even divine intervention may not be enough to ensure she survives the worst that the Forces of Darkness can send her way!

volume.name: Warrior Nun Areala: Armor of God

description: Richard Moore is known for his ability to capture the female form, and he delivers the goods in ladies of the Night, a devilishly delicious assembly of gorgeous women who happen to be just a little bit evil. Witches, vampires, devil girls, they're all here... and each one comes with a morbid little verse to get you (or her) in the right mood...

volume.name: Mobile Suit Gundam AGE: First Evolution
Mobile Suit Gundam AGE: Memories of Sid

description: The conclusion to Jamie Delano's first Crossed arc is here. It’s a reunion (of sorts) of the cast, some of whom have been completely overtaken by the murderous urges of the Crossed disease. Alone in the Everglades and surrounded, armed but hampered by her sudden need to have a baby, Steve makes a decision that you’ll never see coming! It’s the gut-wrenching, explosive finale you’d come to expect from Crossed!

The Jokerz have attacked three strategic points in Gotham City: a busy skyway, a reservoir, and a middle school! Batman might be the protector of Gotham City, but how can he be at three places at once?!
name: 10,000 Clowns, Part 1 of 10: Crooked Parallel Lines Pt. 1

volume.name: Bill the Bull: One Shot, One Bourbon, One Beer

description: Here is volume two in the definitive three-volume graphic novel collection of the acclaimed cult classic and 2005 Eisner Award nominated series. Radiant City was built to be the dream city, a vast and beautiful metropolis, designed to fulfill the grandest aesthetic and architectural ideals. It now smolders in dilapidation, its citizens afflicted with all forms of madness, bizarre addictions and a surfeit of perversions. Stranded in the city is the mysterious Mister X. His past shrouded in mystery, he struggles to unlock the city's secrets even as he labors to protect his own.

person_credits.name: Dave McKean
person_credits.role: artist, penciler, letterer, inker, colorist, cover

volume.name: Awesome: The Indie Spinner Rack Anthology
